files.patch:
@@ -2089,1 +2089,1 @@
-  // misc flags
+  // misc flags(Changes should synced with ClassesDCmd::ClassesDCmd help doc)

@@ -961,1 +961,10 @@
-  _verbose("verbose", "Dump the detail content of each internal class representation",
+  _verbose("-verbose",
+           "Dump the detail content of Java class. "
+           "Some classes are annotated with flags: "
+           "F = has finializer method, "
+           "f = has final method, "
+           "V = has vanilla constructor, "
+           "W = methods rewritten, "
+           "C = marked with contended annotation, "
+           "R = has been redefined, "
+           "S = is shared class",
